page.title: 02WORCESTER,BIRMINGHAM CANAL
page.content: The canal has boats going along it from Birmingham to Worcester.These boats are dangerous to fish.The noise of the boat scares fish away and the fish sometimes die of fright or are killed by the boats themselves. At the bottom of the canal there is mud.This mud gets there because people throw it in or the rain washes it in.The canal is used for fishing.A lot of people go fishing down the canal.On the canal there are locks these locks are for the boats,they stop the water from rushing in to the open canal.The canal is dangerous for little children to be by.People have drowned in the canal because people fell in and the mud dragged them down.The water of the canals is always dirty.
